title: nebula_coin
author: nebula_coin
content: Coin SpecsDescription in few words: Masternode Coin for Nebula Ecosystem. 200,000,000 supply (20 Million). 50,000 NBLA towards Marketing Funds.50,000 NBLA towards Community Rewards.50,000 NBLA towards Business Development.Details:PoS: from the block 1602 - 46080000Algorithm: QuarkPremine: 200,000Block Time: 60 SecondsMaturity: 40 ConfirmationsMN Collateral: 50,000 NBLAPrefix: Nebula (NBLA) addresses start with the capital letter "R"Port: 1818RPC Port: 1819---Nebula Coin phase 1 (Launch) lead developer: DigiWarfare: https://github.com/SpectreSecurity---Links:Explorer: https://explorer.nebulaproject.ioWebsite: https://nebulaproject.iohttps://github.com/Nebula-Coin/nebula-project-coin/Social:Discord: https://discord.gg/dm68UDdSTwitter: https://twitter.com/NebulaCrypto1Telegram: https://t.me/nebulacoin1Genesis BlockPremineBlock Height: 1 to 100Reward Amount: 200,000 NBLA Initial pre-mineProof of WorkBlock Height: 101 to 1601Reward Amount: 75,000 NBLA PoW rewards---Rewards BreakdownBlock: 1 - 100 - PremineReward in a Single Block: 2000Total: 200,000 NBLABlock: 101 - 1601 - Proof of WorkReward in a Single Block: 50Total: 75,000Block: 1602 - 360000 [Phase 1]MN Reward: 35.75 (65%)Staker Reward: 19.25 (35%)--Rewards & Halving(Reward breakdown: Master Node Reward and Staker Reward) Phase 1 35.75 19.25  Phase 2 20.04 13.06  Phase 3 11.55 09.45  Phase 4 06.05 06.05 Phase 5 03.06 04.04 Phase 6 02.00 03.00 Phase 7 01.05 01.95 Phase 8 00.60 01.40---Wallets went live on, January 21st 2023 and are available at: https://github.com/Nebula-Coin/nebula-project-coin/releasesFirst exchange where Nebula is available is at Xeggex with whose team we have friendly relationships.Available pairs:https://xeggex.com/market/NBLA_BTChttps://xeggex.com/market/NBLA_USDT---$NBLA coin is listed at NodeStats.info > a new and very cool masternode coin listing site with the investor in mind.$NBLA is also present in the masternode hosting/monitoring system at NodeStats.Watch Nebula (NBLA) data here: https://nodestats.info/default.php?coin=NBLA1 Node = $110 Node = 10% discount. 25 Node = 20% discount. ---$NBLA coin is listed on https://pecuniaplatform.io/ for masternode hostingThey are also offering discounts upto 50%IPV4 servers (Little expensive)1 month - $1.993 months - $4.4775 (25% discount)6 months - $5.97  (50% discount)IPV6 servers1 month $0.993 months 2.2275 (25% discount)6 months $2.97 (50% discount)---Listing on Dex - TradeDex-Trade Exchange has accepted our application, and $NBLA coin should be listed at Dex-Trade within the next 2 weeks. The process for the same is already started from DEX - Trade team.---

comments.author: nebula_coin
comments.body: This is to inform that, we have got listed on Coin paprika https://coinpaprika.com/coin/nbla-nebula/ Cheers !

comments.author: antaresproject
comments.body: Congratulation launching Nebula!You're invited to our Crypto Social network (ACO Social) for you to help you build your community. https://aco.soalso, if you're looking for a Zero-Fee Trading platform, Trade51 is accepting listing: https://trade51.co

comments.author: nebula_coin
comments.body: Hello, We tried registering on both websites. Aco Social and Trade51, but Aco Social is saying there is some problem in registration and Trade51 is saying your form cannot be sent  SMTP connect() failed. https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer/wiki/TroubleshootingRegardsTeam Nebula

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Move this thread here -  Announcements (Altcoins)  as this is not the right place. Also you made a mistake with numbers - "200,000,000 supply (20 Million)." which one is correct? If you want people to read about your project. Expain in 2 sentences why its better than other 20 000 tokens because it looks like another ponzi.

comments.author: antaresproject
comments.created_time: January 25, 2023, 04:25:30 PMLast edit: January 25, 2023, 06:15:53 PM by antaresproject
comments.body: Quote from: nebula_coin on January 25, 2023, 09:24:05 AMHello, We tried registering on both websites. Aco Social and Trade51, but Aco Social is saying there is some problem in registration and Trade51 is saying your form cannot be sent  SMTP connect() failed. https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer/wiki/TroubleshootingRegardsTeam NebulaYes, thanks for the info, we just change Email sending provider and forgot to change form, new listing form is https://forms.zohopublic.com/antarescodes/form/ListingRequestForm/formperma/X4IICbMYKYmAlEoDuLF7KY8ETgFARAA6MTripWlCOQUor access it via the official domain https://trade51.co/page-details/list-your-coinFor creating an ACO Social account, I've just created one, and it's working, we did perform a server upgrade yesterday, this may be the cause or Username box error:(Please select a username of no more than 25 characters using only letters (a-z) numbers and underscores)Good day Team Nebula, and hope to have partnership with you guys.

comments.author: nebula_coin
comments.body: Hello, Tried the form from Zoho, but now it is saying that, I don't belong to the organization. Please look into it. RegardsTeam Nebula

comments.body: Quote from: nebula_coin on January 25, 2023, 05:37:39 PMHello, Tried the form from Zoho, but now it is saying that, I don't belong to the organization. Please look into it. RegardsTeam NebulaOMG, yes this was the private link, here is the public link: https://forms.zohopublic.com/antarescodes/form/ListingRequestForm/formperma/X4IICbMYKYmAlEoDuLF7KY8ETgFARAA6MTripWlCOQUFor any faster communication you can use my Telegram https://t.me/antares_ge, I'm a member of your TG Nebula group
